p: In this study, promastigotes of L.m.m. were incubated in the presence of various concentrations of essential oils and pure compounds. The cell viability was determined after 72 h using Alamar Blue assay. This is the first time that the anti-leishmanial activity of H. tuberculanum essential oils is shown with IC 50 range from 6.48 to >100 μg/ml and dose-dependent responses ( P≤0.05: Table 2).
